meanings.sent1: She would often cark about her upcoming exams.
meanings.sent2: I cark when I hear thunder during a storm.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to cark about the missing toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His mind was carked with thoughts of the unfinished project.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds looming overhead made her cark about the picnic plans.

meanings.sent1: The constant cark about his health affected his sleep.
meanings.sent2: Financial cark can cause stress in many families.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's biggest cark was losing her favorite doll.
meanings.sent4: The cark of finding a parking spot in the city can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The cark of the looming deadline hung over the team like a dark cloud.
